title: FS: 1948 Satchel Paige rookie autograph postcard
author: Rucc_31

posts.post_title: FS: 1948 Satchel Paige rookie autograph postcard
posts.post_content:
a postcard with a portrait of paige on t he front, autographed as well as his handwriting to a fan on the back and a stamp dating it Aug. 7, 1948, three days after his first major league start. the autograph along with the stamp, makes it a one of a kind piece of one of the games greatest. A rookie auto you may never see again. PSA/DNA authenticated and comes with a LOA.  

$$SOLD$$
